title: Populate Exercise Info intro paragraph with screenshot-like dummy text

requirements.text:
Update the Exercise Info page intro paragraph (the text rendered in the first

under the exercise title on /exercise-info) to use dummy copy matching the provided screenshot style for the “Equal Breathing” exercise.

quotes: please fill these with dummy data like the screenshot here

acceptanceCriteria: When opening Exercise Info for exerciseId="equal-breathing", the intro paragraph under the “Equal Breathing” title contains screenshot-like dummy text (English) rather than the current/empty copy.
Only the intro paragraph content is changed (the element corresponding to /html/body/div/div/main/div/p[1]); no other sections, layout, or components are modified.

constraints: Apply changes only to the selected element’s content: the intro paragraph rendered under the exercise title on the Exercise Info page (/html/body/div/div/main/div/p[1]).
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Do not change accordion sections (Benefits/Method/Instructions/etc.) content or behavior.
Do not add new navigation controls or modify the back button behavior.
